babble.net.http

Class HttpRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • babble.net.Router<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
      • babble.net.http.HttpRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, ThreadFactory

    public class HttpRouter
extends Router<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>
    A router for HTTP request that matches path to an operation.
    Author:
    pinaki poddar
